intervalId.description: time period for stats in date-time format yyyy-mm-dd:hh:mm:ss

unit.description: Unit of time for these stats from the intervalId forwards.

messages.all.messages.count.description: Total message count, excluding presence messages.

messages.all.messages.data.description: Total message size, excluding presence messages.

messages.all.messages.uncompressedData.description: Total uncompressed message size, excluding presence messages.

messages.outbound.httpEvent.all.count.description: Total messages sent by a HTTP trigger (typically a serverless function on a service such as AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, or Azure Functions).

messages.outbound.httpEvent.all.data.description: Total size of messages sent by a HTTP trigger (typically a serverless function on a service such as AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, or Azure Functions).

messages.outbound.httpEvent.all.uncompre.description: Total uncompressed size of messages sent by a HTTP trigger (typically a serverless function on a service such as AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, or Azure Functions).

messages.outbound.httpEvent.messages.cou.description: Total messages sent by a HTTP trigger (typically a serverless function on a service such as AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, or Azure Functions), excluding presence messages.

messages.outbound.httpEvent.messages.dat.description: Total size of messages sent by a HTTP trigger (typically a serverless function on a service such as AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, or Azure Functions), excluding presence messages.

messages.outbound.httpEvent.messages.unc.description: Total uncompressed size of messages sent by a HTTP trigger (typically a serverless function on a service such as AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, or Azure Functions), excluding presence messages.

messages.outbound.httpEvent.presence.cou.description: Total presence messages sent by a HTTP trigger (typically a serverless function on a service such as AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, or Azure Functions).

messages.outbound.httpEvent.presence.dat.description: Total size of presence messages sent by a HTTP trigger (typically a serverless function on a service such as AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, or Azure Functions).

messages.outbound.httpEvent.presence.unc.description: Total uncompressed size of presence messages sent by a HTTP trigger (typically a serverless function on a service such as AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, or Azure Functions).

channels.refused.description: Total number of channel attach requests that failed because of permissions.

apiRequests.all.refused.description: Total number of refused requests (due to account limits).

apiRequests.tokenRequests.succeeded.description: Total number of token requests made.

apiRequests.tokenRequests.failed.description: Total number of failed token requests.

apiRequests.tokenRequests.refused.description: Total number of refused token requests (due to permissions or rate limiting).

apiRequests.push.succeeded.description: Total number of Push requests made.

apiRequests.push.failed.description: Total number of failed Push requests.

apiRequests.push.refused.description: Total number of refused Push requests.

apiRequests.other.succeeded.description: Total number of requests made, excluding token and Push requests.

apiRequests.other.failed.description: Total number of failed requests, excluding token and Push requests.

apiRequests.other.refused.description: Total number of refused requests, excluding token and Push requests.

push.channelMessages.description: Total number of Push channel messages.

push.notifications.delivered.description: Total number of delivered Push notifications.

push.notifications.failed.description: Total number of failed Push notifications.

push.notifications.refused.description: Total number of refused Push notifications.
